ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Sandra K. Ballance ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. SANDRA K. BALLANCE, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 31, 2016.
